h2_title: Where to Find First Prince of Flowing Sands
content: If you didn't kill the King during the previous fight and only defeated the Second Rat Prince, the King will have fled -- to this very area in fact. When you approach, he'll summon his son, but meet an untimely demise.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'First_Prince_of_Flowing_Sands.md', within the main section titled 'First Prince of Flowing Sands', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find First Prince of Flowing Sands'.
The content is as follows:
If you didn't kill the King during the previous fight and only defeated the Second Rat Prince, the King will have fled -- to this very area in fact. When you approach, he'll summon his son, but meet an untimely demise.
